title.rendered: Tickmill Expands Research & Education Offering with Exclusive Partnership

content.rendered:
Well-known broker Tickmill has announced it is entering into an exclusive partnership with trading coach Patrick Munnelly. The self-educated professional trader has been making his way in the trading world for more than a decade and has been educating over a hundred retail traders. He’s been passionate about demonstrating valuable ways of developing effective trading strategies and identifying profitable trading opportunities. Mr. Munnelly will provide daily technical insights and forecasts into various markets on Tickmill’s blog and covering a range of relevant trading topics through his weekly live webinar sessions.

The addition of Mr. Munnelly to Tickmill’s team is a great example of a topic our experts covered at the Finance Magnates London Summit panel discussion – namely that brokers can establish personal brands within their research and education offerings by bringing on well-known and well-followed professionals to provide daily or weekly content to traders and those seeking to learn how to trade the markets. These brands tend to have a great following that will likely migrate to the new brokerage where the individual is now based.
